name: TempLooter
description:
Gameplay

For now the main objective is to take as much gold out of the temple as you can.
You earn gold by killing lizards, and earning rewards from the totem in the temple. Not really much else to it for now.

Description

This is and updated  version of my Ludum Dare 48 submission, which you can check out here. I will hopefully keep updating it until it reaches my vision for the game. If you have any suggestions on what can be changed, please leave them in the comments or on the game's ludum dare page.

Controls

WASD or  ↑←↓→  to move around

Space to Attack / to press the ✗ button

E to Interact  / to press the ✓ button
